text: The 4 × 75 metres relay at the Olympics of Grace was held in Florence at the ASSI Giglio Rosso from 30 to 31 May 1931. On 30 May 1931 semi-finals were held during the morning session and the final was held the day afterwards during the afternoon session. Teams from eight countries competed in the event. ==Schedule== All times are local time. Date Time Round 30 May 1931 11:00 Semi- finals 31 May 1931 17:15 Final ==Results== ===Semi-finals=== The semi-finals took place in the morning session starting at 11:00am (local time). The semi- finals consisted of two races where the top three teams of each heat qualified for the final. ====Semi-final 1==== Rank Country Names Time Notes 1 Nellie Halstead Muriel Cornell Daisy Ridgley 38.0 Q 2 Anna Hřebřinová 38.2 Q 3 Lidia Bongiovanni 38.4 Q, \- Helmi Singer Veronika Kohlbach ====Semi-final 2==== Rank Country Names Time Notes 1 Angela Petrović Silvia Capsali Irina Orendi Ilse Hausletner 40.2 Q 2 Zrnka Krajnović Vera Neferović Anita Batelkova Zulejka Stefanini - Q 3 Elise Van Truyen Jeanne Van Kesteren Lucie Petit Rosa Pelariaux - Q \- Lisa Gelius Tilly Fleischer Marie Dollinger ===Final=== The final of the 4 × 75 metres relay event took place on 31 May 1931 during the afternoon session at 17:15 (local time). Rank Country Names Time Notes Nellie Halstead Muriel Cornell Daisy Ridgley 38.6 Lidia Bongiovanni 39.2 Anna Hřebřinová \- 4 Angela Petrović Silvia Capsali Irina Orendi Ilse Hausletner - 5 Zrnka Krajnović Vera Neferović Anita Batelkova Zulejka Stefanini - 6 Elise Van Truyen Jeanne Van Kesteren Lucie Petit Rosa Pelariaux - ==References== Category:Athletics at the Olympics of Grace
title: Athletics at the Olympics of Grace – 4 × 75 metres relay
